input: question: Who distributed 'War Horse'? [SEP] sentence: The film, based on the novel of the same name written by Michael Morpurgo and published in 1982, follows the long friendship between a British boy and his horse Joey before and during World War I – the novel was also adapted into a hit play in London which is still running there, as well as on Broadway.

question: Who was allowed to settle on the Swiss plateau by the end of the 4th century? question: What broke away from the Armenian Evangelical Church? [SEP] sentence: While the Armenian Apostolic Church remains the most prominent church in the Armenian community throughout the world, Armenians (especially in the diaspora) subscribe to any number of other Christian denominations.

question: Who was the general manger of Sony's audio department in 1971? [SEP] sentence: Heitaro Nakajima, who developed an early digital audio recorder within Japan's national public broadcasting organization NHK in 1970, became general manager of Sony's audio department in 1971.

question: What was the North American megafauna extinction coincidental with? [SEP] sentence: However, in other locations such as Australia, humans are thought to have played a very significant role in the extinction of the Australian megafauna that was widespread prior to human occupation.
